title: Judge Orders Release of 5 Year Old and Father From ICE Detention

The judge criticized the deportation quotas that led to their detention and previously blocked their removal from the U.S. The case drew national attention after images of Liam in detention were widely circulated.

title: Senators Defeat Devils 4 1 as Ullmark Returns

OTTAWA, Ontario (AP) — Linus Ullmark made 26 saves in his first start for Ottawa since taking a leave of absence Dec. 28, Brady Tkachuk had a goal and two assists and the Senators beat the New Jersey Devils 4-1 on Saturday night. Tim Stutzle had a goal and an assist, and Dylan Cozens scored his 100th NHL goal for Ottawa. The Senators have won three in a row. Timo Meier scored, and Jake Allen made 30 saves for New Jersey.
